title: Was Dell actually FIRST?? - UltraSharp 40" Curved WUHD Monitor
description: Win a Yeelight Mystery Box valued at $299 at   So Dell wasn't first, well, not exactly, but we're not too sure what we think about this monitor. Is it something of value to have it curved or even at 5K? Well, maybe, but if you're going to release it now, it needs to have HDMI 2.1 at least!  The monitor isn't available yet but see Dell's other monitors at   Buy Dell Ultrasharp Curved Monitors On Amazon (PAID LINK):     On NewEgg (PAID LINK):   On BHPhoto (PAID LINK):  On BestBuy (PAID LINK):   Buy LG Ultrawide 5K Monitor 34WK95U On Amazon (PAID LINK):     On BHPhoto (PAID LINK):     On BestBuy (PAID LINK):   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.
